name: Curve ibAUD Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ibAUD, a synthetic Australian dollar minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Australian dollar (sAUD) minted on the Synthetix platform.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ibAUD, a synthetic Australian dollar minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Australian dollar (sAUD) minted on the Synthetix platform.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ibAUD, a synthetic Australian dollar minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Australian dollar (sAUD) minted on the Synthetix platform.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo contiene ibAUD, un dólar australiano sintético acuñado en Iron Bank, y un dólar australiano sintético (sAUD) acuñado en la plataforma Synthetix.

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ibAUD, a synthetic Australian dollar minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Australian dollar (sAUD) minted on the Synthetix platform.

This pool contains ibAUD, a synthetic Australian dollar minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Australian dollar (sAUD) minted on the Synthetix platform.

el.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ibAUD, a synthetic Australian dollar minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Australian dollar (sAUD) minted on the Synthetix platform.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz, Iron Bank'tan basılan sentetik bir Avustralya doları olan ibAUD'u ve Synthetix platformunda basılan sentetik Avustralya dolarını (sAUD) içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains ibAUD, a synthetic Australian dollar minted from the Iron Bank, and synthetic Australian dollar (sAUD) minted on the Synthetix platform.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含由 Iron Bank 发行的合成澳元 ibAUD，以及由 Synthetix 发行的合成澳元 sAUD。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस पूल में ibAUD, Iron Bank से ढाला गया एक सिंथेटिक ऑस्ट्रेलियाई डॉलर और Synthetix प्लेटफॉर्म पर ढाला गया सिंथेटिक ऑस्ट्रेलियाई डॉलर (sAUD) शामिल है।
